title: Daggerfall Unity Mod Manifest File
description: Manifest file, tipically with .dfmod.json extension, for a mod.

ModTitle.description: A readable title for the mod.

ModAuthor.description: Name of the author of the mod.

ContactInfo.description: Contact informations, like an email address or the url of a page on Nexus Mods or other websites.

DFUnity_Version.description: The minimum supported version of the game, compared automatically with local game version.

ModDescription.description: A short description of the mod. Line endings are supported.

GUID.description: A GUID associated to the mod that shouldn't be altered manually.

Files.description: Assets associated to this mod. They are included with assetbundle during mod creation.

items.description: Relative path from project root of an asset.

Contributes.description: Contributes provided by a mod to be injected in game.

BooksMapping.description: Look-up maps that announce additional books to be imported. See https://www.dfworkshop.net/projects/daggerfall-unity/modding/books/ for details.

items.description: The name of a book mapping file without extension.

SpellIcons.description: Names of spell icon packs. See https://www.dfworkshop.net/projects/daggerfall-unity/modding/additional-resources/#spell-icons for details.

items.description: The name of a Texture2D asset and a TextAsset with `.json` extension.

Dependencies.description: A list of mods that this mod depends on or is otherwise compatible with only if certain conditions are met.

items.description: A set of rules that defines the limits within which a mod is required or otherwise compatible with another one.

IsOptional.description: If true, target mod doesn't need to be available, but must validate these criteria if it is.

IsPeer.description: If true, target mod can be positioned anywhere in the load order, otherwise must be positioned above.

Version.description: If not omitted this string is the minimum accepted version with format X.Y.Z. (without pre-release identifiers).
